title: SGS Schema Version Registry (SSVR) Canonical Format
description: The authoritative registry mapping schema IDs to immutable content hashes, validated by a core attestation quorum.

hash_type.description: The algorithm used for the hash generation.

content_hash.description: Cryptographic hash of the associated content (pattern depends on hash_type).

integrity_hash.description: Cryptographic hash (SHA-384 mandated by SSVR protocol) covering the entire canonical structure, computed before attestation.

sgs_system_version.description: The current version of the Sovereign Governance System operating instance (e.g., V94.4.1).

timestamp.description: RFC 3339 timestamp of the SSVR file generation (ZonedDateTime required).

schema_definitions.description: Registry of all mandated schemas and their associated immutable content state.

schema_id.description: Short canonical ID for the schema (e.g., GICM, HETM).

purpose.description: Human-readable description of the schema's function.

version.description: Semantic version of the underlying schema content, independent of SGS system version.

attestation_log.description: Log of cryptographic signatures from quorum signers validating this SSVR instance. Validation requires a dynamic quorum consensus based on the current Governance Attestation Set (GAS).

signer_id.description: The unique identifier of the quorum signer (e.g., public key hash or registered alias).

signature.description: The cryptographic signature over the integrity_hash.
